mapper.select: select student_name from students where student_id=#{studentId} and pw=#{password}
SELECT subject_grade, category, subject_code, subject_name, professor_name, credit, subject_time, subject_place FROM subjects
SELECT s.subject_name, category, credit, professor_name, subject_time, subject_place, subject_grade FROM registers r, subjects s WHERE r.subject_code = s.subject_code AND score IS NULL
